entry.title: 360 VIDEO: Gentoo penguins welcome season of love by gifting stones to find love

media:group.media:title: 360 VIDEO: Gentoo penguins welcome season of love by gifting stones to find love
media:group.media:description:
It's the season of love for the gentoo penguins at Auckland's Kelly Tarlton's aquarium!
They're wooing each other by presenting specially chosen pebbles to their potential partners, building a nest for their babies.
1 NEWS got down in the ice for an up-close look - move your device or swipe the video to have a look around this 360 video.
